name: Abandoned Supermarket
description: <name> enters a ruined supermarket. Shelves are smashed and dust fills the air.

search.dialog: A rat leaps out and scratches you while scavenging the shelves.

leave.dialog: You leave before anything else happens.

name: Wandering Dog
description: A thin, starving dog approaches <name> cautiously.

feed.dialog: The dog devours your {foodName} and looks at you gratefully before running off.

scare.dialog: You shout loudly. The dog flees, but your throat strains.

name: Gun Store Ruins
description: The collapsed gun shop lies silent. Rusted metal glints in the rubble.

search.dialog: You crawl inside and find a shotgun under debris.

avoid.dialog: You decide the building is too unstable.

name: Abandoned Kitchen
description: Inside a destroyed home, the kitchen cabinets remain untouched.

search.dialog: You find a sealed instant noodle pack—surprising it survived.

leave.dialog: The rotten smell forces you out.

name: Military Supply Drop
description: A half-broken military crate lies in the mud.

open.dialog: You pry the crate open and find a clean shotgun with shells.

name: Vending Machine
description: An untouched vending machine stands between collapsed buildings.

kick.dialog: You kick it hard. Pain shoots up your leg, but a snack falls out.

shake.dialog: You shake it aggressively, but nothing drops.

name: Gas Station Boxes
description: Several sealed boxes remain near an exploded gas station.

search.dialog: You find antibiotics, but a metal shard slices your hand.

name: Alley Zombie
description: A lone zombie blocks the narrow alley.

fight.dialog: You kill the zombie after a brutal struggle.

name: Sewer Groans
description: A sewer hatch is open. Something moves in the darkness below.

investigate.dialog: A zombie lunges upward, forcing you to defend yourself.

close hatch.dialog: You shut the hatch and escape quickly.

name: Broken Bridge
description: While crossing an old wooden bridge, a plank snaps beneath <name>.

dialog.hasWeapon: The bridge shakes violently! Your shotgun slips from your pack and falls into the river.
dialog.noWeapon: You slip but manage to grab the railing. Nothing is lost.

go around.dialog: You take a longer route, spending extra energy.

name: Thief in the Shadows
description: A quick figure sneaks behind <name> and grabs your bag.

chase.dialog: You chase the thief, but they escape with your {foodName}.

ignore.dialog: Better not risk an ambush in the dark.

name: Collapsed Library
description: Books and debris cover the floor of a ruined library.

search.dialog: You find emergency crackers in a forgotten backpack.

name: Quiet Garden
description: A destroyed backyard garden still has untouched vegetables.

rest.dialog: You sit among the broken planters and regain energy.

name: Car Wreck Loot
description: A crashed pickup sits in the road, its doors still locked.

break in.dialog: You break the window, cutting yourself but finding food.

search trunk.dialog: You pry open the trunk and find packaged noodles.

name: Night Stalker
description: At night, <name> senses a zombie creeping behind them.

confront.dialog: You turn and fight the lurking zombie.

hide.dialog: You hide until it wanders away.
